org.sofof

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.sofof.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Server
extends Thread

    Sofof default server

    this server offer the database services for sessions 
     Server s = new Server(new File("db"), 6969, false);
 s.startUp();
    you can configure the server using xml files. The file should have the sofof.xml name and should be placed in the default package
    Author:
    Rami Manaf Abdullah
    See Also:
    User

        public Server(File db,
              int port,
              boolean ssl)
        Parameters:
        db - database folder
        port - port which the server will listen to sessions requests. pass -1 for using Server locally
        ssl - use ssl

        users - users list

      • createDatabase

        public boolean createDatabase()
                       throws SofofException
        creates a new database folder and binds file. if there is an existing folder this method will not do anything
        Returns:
        true if a new database is created successfully and false if there is a folder with the same name
        Throws:
        SofofException
